Position Scope CE is looking for one Co-op student interested in developing their IT Support skills, supporting Business, Engineering, and Operations Users. As a key part of the Information Technology team, you will assist the IT Administrator in providing infrastructure support services to users. Reporting to the IT Administrator, typical tasks in this role would include IT work related to on-boarding new employees, responding to user requests/incidents, and assisting with our hardware evergreen program.
